thread.title: 'Beauty And The Beast': Title track by Ariana Grande-John Legend is enchanting!
thread.title_full: 'Beauty And The Beast': Title track by Ariana Grande-John Legend is enchanting! - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Beauty And The Beast': Title track by Ariana Grande-John Legend is enchanting!
text:
Popular international singers, Ariana Grande and John Legend , are here to floor you with the title track of Emma Watson and Dan Steven's forthcoming flick 'Beauty And The Beast'. While the final trailer of the film was released only recently, this new number will surely increase the excitement of the fans all across the globe.
Academy Award winner Bill Condon gives this animated classic a new form with a widened mythology and an all-star cast. The latest installment of the franchise will take us back to the beginning of Belle's childhood where she developed her love for books, and then take the story forward from there.
'Beauty And The Beast' will hit the theatres on March 17.
